summary: A 16-year-old girl travels to the human world in the form of a dolphin and forms a connection with a human boy.
cast: Guanlin Ji|Shangqing Su|Timmy Xu|Shulan Pan|Yuanyuan Zhang|Jiu'er|Lifang Xue|Jie Zhang|Xiaoyu Liu|Zhongyang Baomu|Yu Cheng|JB Blanc|Johnny Yong Bosch|Greg Chun|Cam Clarke|Todd Haberkorn|Kyle Hebert|Kate Higgins|Erika Ishii|Guangtao Jiang|Shih-Chieh King|Yuri Lowenthal|Cassandra Lee Morris|Cindy Robinson|Stephanie Sheh|Elizabeth Sung|Fong Sung|Deshun Wang|Goddess Wu
keywords: scene during end credits|brother sister relationship|anime|chinese anime|dolphin
director: Directors: Xuan Liang (as Liang Xuan), Chun Zhang (as Zhang Chun)
title: Big Fish & Begonia
